column1: The Gann Report received qualified approval from the colleges, though in many quarters regret was expressed that it had not taken the opportunity to recommend a single validating body for all courses in art and design, and not just non - advanced ones, and that its proposal for two different types of courses was ‘ elitist’ and a vain attempt to separate the sheep from the goats.
column3: separate the sheep from the goats

column1: Running down, or, as the current euphemism has it, rationalizing a business, while keeping the enthusiasm, loyalty and commitment of one's people, and fighting back in the marketplace, is one of the most difficult of industrial situations, and certainly separates the sheep from the goats in a management sense.
